meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Haiti.
meanings.sent1: In Haiti, people use gourdes to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for gourdes at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was full of shiny gourdes.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a thousand gourdes.
meanings.sent5: The sound of clinking gourdes filled the marketplace.

meanings.sent1: The farmer grew gourdes in his garden.
meanings.sent2: I like to cook gourdes with butter and salt.
meanings.sent3: The gourdes rolled off the table and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as curly and round as a gourde.
meanings.sent5: The gourdes in the field looked like little green lanterns.
